Text:
It was under the ‘sampige’ - 
 The fragrant champa tree

That I waited for Ajji 
 To walk me home.

All along I’d ask her - 
 Neer dosa? Allugeda? Bhaath? 
 She’d simply shrug 
 Smiling indulgently

Lunch was a glorious affair 
 My joyous feet dangling

Eyes hungry, mouth watering. 
 Awaiting Ajji’s spread 
 “Dear netizens, 
 It’s simply 1-2-3  
 100 gm chickpea flour 200 sugar, 300 ghee

Mysore Pak needs 
 2 Tbsp water 
 1 for milk and 1 for oil 
 Pinch for turmeric, double for NaHCO3

The whole recipe 
 Next steps, videos 
 Even Ajji’s jokes 
 Are now online to see.
THINK: Is serving others a sacrifice? Can it be about sharing?
